titles.title: BRAC Data Disclosure Act

To require, in the event of any future round of base realignments and closures, the prompt release of all military value data used by the Secretary of Defense to prepare the recommendations of the Secretary for the realignment and closure of military installations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: 11/10/2005--Introduced. BRAC Data Disclosure Act - Directs the Secretary of Defense, in the event of any future round of military base realignments and closures, to make available to the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission appointed in that round, and to the public in unclassified form, all of the military value data used by the Secretary to prepare recommendations for such realignments and closures.
